meals.name: Traditional Japanese Breakfast Set
meals.description: Classic Japanese breakfast with grilled salmon, miso soup, rice, and pickled vegetables
instructions: Cook rice in rice cooker
Prepare dashi stock and add miso paste
Add tofu and wakame to soup
Grill salmon with salt
Serve with pickled vegetables

meals.name: Tamagoyaki with Rice
meals.description: Sweet rolled Japanese omelette served with steamed rice and nori
instructions: Mix eggs with dashi, sugar, soy sauce, and mirin
Heat tamagoyaki pan with oil
Pour thin layer of egg mixture and roll
Repeat layers until all egg is used
Slice and serve with rice and nori

meals.name: Okayu Rice Porridge
meals.description: Comforting Japanese rice porridge with soft-boiled egg and umeboshi
instructions: Rinse rice and add to pot with water
Bring to boil then simmer for 30 minutes stirring occasionally
Soft boil egg separately
Top porridge with egg, umeboshi, green onion, and sesame

meals.name: Korean Egg Rice Bowl
meals.description: Gyeran Bap - simple Korean comfort food with fried egg over rice and sesame oil
instructions: Cook rice and place in bowl
Fry eggs sunny side up
Place eggs on rice
Drizzle sesame oil and soy sauce
Top with sesame seeds and green onion

meals.name: Hobak Juk
meals.description: Sweet Korean pumpkin porridge, a traditional healing food
instructions: Steam and mash kabocha squash
Mix rice flour with water to make slurry
Combine squash with water and bring to boil
Add rice flour slurry and stir until thickened
Season with sugar and salt, top with pine nuts

meals.name: Kimchi Fried Rice
meals.description: Spicy fried rice with aged kimchi and fried egg
instructions: Dice spam and fry until crispy
Add chopped kimchi and stir fry
Add rice and gochugaru, mix well
Push rice aside and fry egg
Drizzle sesame oil and top with green onion

meals.name: Greek Yogurt Bowl
meals.description: Creamy Greek yogurt with honey, walnuts, and fresh berries
instructions: Place Greek yogurt in bowl
Drizzle with honey
Top with walnuts and berries
Sprinkle chia seeds
Add granola for crunch

meals.name: Shakshuka
meals.description: Eggs poached in spiced tomato sauce with crusty bread
instructions: Saute onion and pepper in olive oil
Add garlic and spices
Pour in tomatoes and simmer
Make wells and crack eggs into sauce
Cover and cook until eggs set, top with feta

meals.name: Avocado Toast with Feta
meals.description: Smashed avocado on sourdough with feta, tomatoes, and olive oil
instructions: Toast sourdough bread
Mash avocado with lemon juice and salt
Spread avocado on toast
Top with feta and halved tomatoes
Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle red pepper flakes

meals.name: Classic Eggs Benedict
meals.description: Poached eggs on English muffin with Canadian bacon and hollandaise
instructions: Make hollandaise with egg yolks, butter, and lemon
Toast English muffins
Warm Canadian bacon
Poach eggs in simmering water with vinegar
Assemble and drizzle with hollandaise

meals.name: Fluffy Pancakes
meals.description: Light and fluffy buttermilk pancakes with maple syrup and butter
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in bowl
Whisk wet ingredients separately
Combine wet and dry until just mixed
Cook on buttered griddle until bubbles form
Flip and cook until golden, serve with syrup

meals.name: Bacon and Cheese Omelette
meals.description: Fluffy three-egg omelette with crispy bacon and melted cheddar
instructions: Cook bacon until crispy and crumble
Beat eggs with milk, salt, and pepper
Melt butter in pan and add eggs
When nearly set, add cheese and bacon
Fold and slide onto plate, top with chives

meals.name: Ful Medames
meals.description: Egyptian fava bean breakfast with olive oil, lemon, and warm pita
instructions: Heat fava beans and mash lightly
Add minced garlic and cumin
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice
Top with diced tomato and parsley
Serve with warm pita bread

meals.name: Turkish Menemen
meals.description: Scrambled eggs with tomatoes, peppers, and Turkish spices
instructions: Saute onion and pepper in olive oil
Add diced tomatoes and cook until soft
Season with paprika and salt
Add beaten eggs and scramble gently
Serve hot with crusty bread

meals.name: Labneh with Za'atar
meals.description: Creamy strained yogurt with olive oil, za'atar, and fresh vegetables
instructions: Spread labneh on plate
Drizzle generously with olive oil
Sprinkle za'atar on top
Arrange cucumber and tomatoes around
Serve with warm pita and mint

meals.name: Chicken Teriyaki Bento
meals.description: Grilled chicken with sweet teriyaki sauce, rice, and pickled vegetables
instructions: Cook rice
Make teriyaki sauce from soy, mirin, sake, sugar
Grill chicken and glaze with sauce
Slice chicken and arrange in bento
Add rice, broccoli, and pickled ginger

meals.name: Tonkotsu Ramen
meals.description: Rich pork bone broth ramen with chashu, soft egg, and nori
instructions: Simmer pork belly for chashu
Heat pork broth with soy sauce
Cook ramen noodles
Slice chashu and halve eggs
Assemble with toppings and nori

meals.name: Salmon Onigiri Set
meals.description: Rice balls with salmon filling, miso soup, and edamame
instructions: Cook sushi rice and let cool slightly
Shape rice into triangles with salmon center
Wrap with nori strips
Make miso soup with dashi and tofu
Steam edamame with salt

meals.name: Katsu Curry
meals.description: Crispy breaded pork cutlet with Japanese curry sauce and rice
instructions: Pound pork thin and bread with flour, egg, panko
Deep fry until golden and crispy
Simmer vegetables and add curry roux
Cook rice
Slice katsu and serve with curry over rice

meals.name: Bibimbap
meals.description: Korean mixed rice bowl with vegetables, beef, and gochujang sauce
instructions: Cook rice and keep warm
Saute each vegetable separately with sesame oil
Marinate and cook beef with soy sauce
Fry eggs sunny side up
Arrange all over rice and serve with gochujang

meals.name: Japchae
meals.description: Sweet potato glass noodles stir-fried with vegetables and beef
instructions: Soak and cook glass noodles
Stir-fry vegetables separately
Cook marinated beef
Toss everything with sauce
Garnish with sesame seeds

meals.name: Sundubu Jjigae
meals.description: Spicy soft tofu stew with seafood and vegetables
instructions: Saute aromatics with gochugaru
Add stock and bring to boil
Add seafood and vegetables
Gently add soft tofu in chunks
Crack egg on top and serve bubbling

meals.name: Dakgalbi
meals.description: Spicy stir-fried chicken with vegetables and rice cakes
instructions: Cut chicken and marinate in spicy sauce
Slice cabbage and sweet potato
Stir-fry chicken with vegetables
Add rice cakes and cook through
Add cheese to center and melt

meals.name: Greek Salad with Grilled Chicken
meals.description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with feta, olives, and herb-marinated chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken with olive oil and oregano
Grill chicken until cooked through
Chop vegetables and combine in bowl
Add olives and crumbled feta
Top with sliced chicken and dress with lemon oil

meals.name: Falafel Wrap
meals.description: Crispy chickpea falafel in pita with tahini sauce and fresh vegetables
instructions: Soak chickpeas overnight and blend with herbs
Form into balls and deep fry until golden
Make tahini sauce with lemon and garlic
Warm pita and fill with vegetables
Add falafel and drizzle with tahini

meals.name: Grilled Fish with Tabbouleh
meals.description: Herb-crusted grilled fish with fresh parsley and bulgur salad
instructions: Soak bulgur in hot water until tender
Chop herbs and vegetables for tabbouleh
Season fish with garlic, lemon, and olive oil
Grill fish until flaky
Serve fish over fresh tabbouleh

meals.name: Spanakopita
meals.description: Greek spinach and feta pie in crispy phyllo pastry
instructions: Saute spinach and onion until wilted
Mix with feta, eggs, and dill
Layer phyllo sheets brushed with butter
Add filling and top with more phyllo
Bake until golden and crispy

meals.name: Classic BLT Sandwich
meals.description: Crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, and tomato on toasted sourdough
instructions: Cook bacon until crispy
Toast sourdough in butter
Spread mayo on toast
Layer lettuce, tomato, and bacon
Season with pepper and close sandwich

meals.name: Caesar Salad
meals.description: Romaine lettuce with creamy Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan
instructions: Season and grill chicken breast
Chop romaine and place in bowl
Toss with Caesar dressing
Top with shaved parmesan and croutons
Add sliced grilled chicken

meals.name: Grilled Cheese with Tomato Soup
meals.description: Melty cheddar sandwich with creamy homemade tomato soup
instructions: Saute onion and garlic for soup base
Add tomatoes and simmer
Blend and add cream
Butter bread and add cheese
Grill until golden and cheese melts

meals.name: Turkey Club Wrap
meals.description: Sliced turkey with bacon, avocado, and ranch in a flour tortilla
instructions: Cook bacon until crispy
Spread ranch on tortilla
Layer turkey, cheese, bacon
Add avocado, lettuce, and tomato
Roll tightly and slice in half

meals.name: Chicken Shawarma Plate
meals.description: Spiced grilled chicken with hummus, rice, and garlic sauce
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and olive oil
Grill or pan-fry chicken
Cook basmati rice
Make garlic sauce from yogurt
Plate with rice, hummus, chicken, and pickles

meals.name: Lamb Kofta with Couscous
meals.description: Spiced lamb skewers with mint yogurt sauce and fluffy couscous
instructions: Mix lamb with onion, parsley, and spices
Form into kofta shapes on skewers
Grill until charred and cooked
Prepare couscous with hot broth and olive oil
Serve with mint yogurt sauce

meals.name: Chicken Biryani
meals.description: Fragrant spiced rice with chicken and caramelized onions
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices
Fry onions until golden brown
Partially cook chicken
Parboil rice with whole spices
Layer rice and chicken, steam together

meals.name: Lentil Soup with Pita
meals.description: Middle Eastern red lentil soup with cumin and lemon
instructions: Saute onion, carrot, and garlic in olive oil
Add lentils, cumin, and broth
Simmer for 25 minutes until lentils are soft
Blend until smooth
Add lemon juice and serve with pita

meals.name: Sukiyaki
meals.description: Sweet soy-braised beef and vegetables in hot pot with raw egg dip
instructions: Combine soy sauce, mirin, and sugar for sauce
Melt beef fat in hot pot and sear beef
Add sauce and vegetables in sections
Cook until vegetables are tender
Dip in beaten raw egg to eat

meals.name: Chicken Teriyaki Set
meals.description: Sweet glazed grilled chicken with rice, salad, and miso soup
instructions: Season chicken and pan-fry
Combine sauce ingredients
Glaze chicken while cooking
Cook rice
Serve with shredded cabbage and tomato

meals.name: Ginger Pork
meals.description: Thinly sliced pork stir-fried with ginger and rice
instructions: Grate ginger and mix with sauce ingredients
Slice pork and onion thinly
Stir-fry pork and onion
Add sauce and cook until glazed
Serve over rice with cabbage

meals.name: Tempura Platter
meals.description: Crispy battered shrimp and vegetables with tentsuyu dipping sauce
instructions: Prep shrimp and slice vegetables
Make light batter with flour, egg, and ice water
Heat oil to 350F
Dip and fry until golden
Serve with tentsuyu and grated daikon

meals.name: Samgyeopsal
meals.description: Korean grilled pork belly with lettuce wraps and dipping sauces
instructions: Slice pork belly thick
Slice garlic
Grill pork belly until crispy on both sides
Grill garlic and chilies alongside
Wrap in lettuce with ssamjang and kimchi

meals.name: Samgyetang
meals.description: Korean ginseng chicken soup with rice stuffing and medicinal herbs
instructions: Soak sweet rice for 1 hour
Stuff hens with rice, garlic, and ginseng
Simmer in water with jujubes and chestnuts for 1 hour
Season with salt and pepper
Serve hot with green onion garnish

meals.name: Gamjatang
meals.description: Spicy pork bone soup with potatoes and perilla leaves
instructions: Blanch pork bones to remove impurities
Simmer bones in water for 1 hour
Add potatoes and seasonings
Cook until potatoes are tender
Garnish with perilla leaves and green onion

meals.name: Bulgogi
meals.description: Sweet soy-marinated Korean beef stir-fry with vegetables
instructions: Marinate beef in sauce for 30 minutes
Slice vegetables thinly
Stir-fry beef and vegetables over high heat
Cook until sauce caramelizes
Garnish with sesame seeds and serve with rice

meals.name: Moussaka
meals.description: Greek layered eggplant casserole with beef and bechamel sauce
instructions: Slice and roast eggplant
Make meat sauce with beef, onion, tomatoes
Make bechamel with butter, flour, milk
Layer eggplant, meat sauce, bechamel
Bake at 375F for 40 minutes

meals.name: Grilled Sea Bass
meals.description: Herb and lemon grilled Mediterranean fish with roasted vegetables
instructions: Season fish with salt, herbs, garlic, and olive oil
Slice vegetables and toss with olive oil
Arrange fish and vegetables on sheet pan
Roast at 400F for 20 minutes
Squeeze lemon over fish before serving

meals.name: Shakshuka Dinner
meals.description: Eggs poached in spiced tomato sauce with feta and crusty bread
instructions: Saute onion and pepper in olive oil
Add garlic and spices
Pour in tomatoes and simmer
Make wells and crack eggs into sauce
Cover and cook until eggs set, top with feta

meals.name: Lamb Chops with Couscous
meals.description: Herb-marinated grilled lamb chops with mint couscous salad
instructions: Marinate lamb with garlic, rosemary, and olive oil
Prepare couscous with hot broth
Grill lamb chops to desired doneness
Mix couscous with mint, cucumber, lemon
Serve lamb over couscous salad

meals.name: Beef Steak
meals.description: Pan-seared ribeye with garlic herb butter and roasted potatoes
instructions: Bring steak to room temperature and season
Cut and roast potatoes
Sear steak in hot pan
Add butter, garlic, and herbs to baste
Rest 5 minutes before slicing

meals.name: Creamy Pasta
meals.description: Fettuccine with bacon, mushrooms, and parmesan cream sauce
instructions: Cook pasta al dente
Fry bacon until crispy
Saute mushrooms in butter
Add cream and cheese for sauce
Toss pasta in sauce with parsley

meals.name: Roast Chicken
meals.description: Herb and lemon whole roasted chicken with root vegetables
instructions: Stuff chicken with lemon, garlic, and herbs
Rub butter under skin
Arrange vegetables in roasting pan
Place chicken on vegetables
Roast at 400F for 1 hour 20 minutes

meals.name: Shepherds Pie
meals.description: Savory beef filling topped with creamy mashed potatoes
instructions: Boil and mash potatoes with butter and milk
Brown beef with onion and carrots
Add tomato paste and broth to simmer
Top meat with mashed potatoes
Bake at 400F for 25 minutes until golden

meals.name: Lamb Biryani
meals.description: Fragrant layered rice dish with spiced lamb and saffron
instructions: Marinate lamb in yogurt and spices for 2 hours
Fry onions until golden
Parboil rice with spices
Layer lamb and rice with saffron milk
Cook covered on low for 25 minutes

meals.name: Grilled Lamb Chops
meals.description: Herb-marinated lamb chops with Middle Eastern spices
instructions: Mix olive oil with garlic and spices
Marinate lamb chops for 1 hour
Preheat grill to high
Grill 4 minutes per side
Rest 5 minutes before serving

meals.name: Chicken Shawarma Platter
meals.description: Spiced grilled chicken with rice, hummus, and vegetables
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and shawarma spice
Grill chicken until charred
Cook basmati rice
Slice chicken thinly
Serve with rice, hummus, and vegetables

meals.name: Beef Kebab Platter
meals.description: Spiced ground beef kebabs with aromatic rice and salad
instructions: Mix ground beef with onion, parsley, and spices
Form into long kebab shapes
Grill kebabs until cooked through
Prepare rice with butter
Serve with fresh salad and tahini

meals.name: Edamame
meals.description: Steamed young soybeans with sea salt
instructions: Boil water with salt
Add edamame and cook 5 minutes
Drain and sprinkle with extra salt
Serve warm or chilled

meals.name: Onigiri
meals.description: Japanese rice balls with savory fillings
instructions: Cook and season rice with salt
Wet hands and form rice into triangles
Press salmon into center
Wrap with nori strip
Sprinkle with sesame seeds

meals.name: Mochi
meals.description: Sweet chewy rice cakes with red bean filling
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and water
Microwave 2 minutes, stir, repeat
Dust surface with potato starch
Divide dough and wrap around bean paste
Shape into balls

meals.name: Tteokbokki
meals.description: Spicy Korean rice cakes in gochujang sauce
instructions: Soak rice cakes in water if frozen
Boil water with gochujang, soy sauce, and sugar
Add rice cakes and cook until soft
Add fish cake slices
Garnish with green onion

meals.name: Korean Corn Dogs
meals.description: Crispy battered hot dogs with sugar coating
instructions: Mix flours, sugar, yeast, and milk into batter
Let rise 30 minutes
Skewer hot dogs on sticks
Dip in batter and deep fry
Roll in sugar while warm

meals.name: Hotteok
meals.description: Sweet Korean pancakes with brown sugar filling
instructions: Mix dough and let rise 1 hour
Mix brown sugar, cinnamon, and walnuts for filling
Form dough balls with filling inside
Flatten on oiled pan
Fry until golden on both sides

meals.name: Hummus with Pita
meals.description: Creamy chickpea dip with warm pita bread
instructions: Blend chickpeas with tahini and lemon juice
Add garlic and cumin, blend smooth
Drizzle with olive oil
Warm pita in oven
Serve with vegetable sticks

meals.name: Feta Stuffed Peppers
meals.description: Mini sweet peppers filled with herbed feta cheese
instructions: Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds
Mix feta with cream cheese, dill, and garlic
Stuff peppers with cheese mixture
Drizzle with olive oil
Refrigerate 30 minutes before serving

meals.name: Spanakopita Bites
meals.description: Crispy phyllo triangles with spinach and feta
instructions: Saute spinach and onion until wilted
Mix with feta, egg, and dill
Cut phyllo into strips and brush with butter
Place filling and fold into triangles
Bake at 375F for 20 minutes

meals.name: Trail Mix
meals.description: Energizing mix of nuts, seeds, and dried fruits
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl
Mix well to distribute evenly
Store in airtight container
Portion into snack bags

meals.name: Cheese Quesadilla
meals.description: Crispy tortilla with melted cheese and salsa
instructions: Heat butter in skillet
Place tortilla and add cheese
Fold in half and cook until golden
Flip and cook other side
Serve with salsa and sour cream

meals.name: Deviled Eggs
meals.description: Classic stuffed eggs with creamy yolk filling
instructions: Hard boil eggs for 12 minutes
Cool and peel eggs
Halve eggs and remove yolks
Mash yolks with mayo, mustard, and vinegar
Pipe filling back into whites and garnish

meals.name: Falafel Bites
meals.description: Crispy fried chickpea balls with tahini dip
instructions: Blend chickpeas with onion, garlic, and herbs
Add spices and form into small balls
Refrigerate 1 hour
Deep fry until golden brown
Serve with tahini sauce

meals.name: Baklava
meals.description: Layered phyllo pastry with nuts and honey syrup
instructions: Layer phyllo sheets with melted butter in baking dish
Add nut mixture in middle layers
Cut into diamonds before baking
Bake at 350F for 45 minutes
Pour honey syrup over hot baklava

meals.name: Labneh Dip
meals.description: Creamy strained yogurt dip with olive oil and za'atar
instructions: Strain yogurt through cheesecloth overnight
Season with salt
Spread on plate and create wells
Drizzle with olive oil and za'atar
Serve with warm pita and cucumber
